creator: sean.mullan@oracle.com
text:
Digest values of References inside Manifest (in xml Object) are calculated after the digest values of References in SignedInfo are calculated, which causes signature verification failure.

See http://bugs.sun.com/bugdatabase/view_bug.do?bug_id=6867348 for more info.

creator: sean.mullan@oracle.com
text: Fixed in HEAD, will be in v1.4.4.
